title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: Scientific Discovery Game-Based Collaboration for Quantum Computer Development

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic physics and computer science concepts
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can explain fundamental principles of quantum computing and experimental problem-solving processes.
Learners achieve an 80% or higher success rate in optimizing quantum system control via game-based simulations.

Learners will analyze role-specific contributions (planner, developer, designer, etc.) using 5-point self- and peer-evaluation surveys during a 1-week collaborative problem-solving process and write a report deriving three key improvement points based on the results.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
